upload.title: Convert your files effortlessly.
upload.subtitle: All file processing is done locally on your device. No file size limit, no ads, no tracking.

tooltip.partial_support: This format can only be converted as {direction}.

archive_file.extracted: Extracted {extract_count} files from {filename}. {ignore_count} items were ignored.

errors.unsupported_format: Only image, audio, and document files are supported
errors.format_output_only: This format can currently only be used as output (converted to), not as input.
errors.worker_downloading: The {type} converter is currently being initialized, please wait a few moments.
errors.worker_error: The {type} converter had an error during initialization, please try again later.
errors.worker_timeout: The {type} converter is taking longer than expected to initialize, please wait a few more moments or refresh the page.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.brightness_description: Choose between light and dark mode.
appearance.effect_description: Enable or disable visual animations and effects.

conversion.title: Conversion
conversion.filename_description: This will determine the name of the file on download, not including the file extension. You can put these following templates in the format, which will be replaced with the relevant information: %name% for the original file name, %extension% for the original file extension, and %date% for a date string of when the file was converted.
conversion.default_format_description: This will change the default format selected when you upload a file of this file type.
conversion.metadata_description: This changes whether any metadata (EXIF, song info, etc.) on the original file is preserved in converted files.
conversion.quality_description: This changes the default output quality of the converted files (in its category). Higher values may result in longer conversion times and file size.

privacy.title: Privacy & data
privacy.fathom_description: We use [fathom_link]Fathom[/fathom_link], a privacy-focused analytics tool, to gather completely anonymous statistics. All data is anonymized and aggregated, and no identifiable information is ever sent or stored. You can choose to opt out below.
privacy.cache_description: We cache the converter files on your browser so you don't have to re-download them every time, improving performance and reducing data usage.
privacy.site_data_description: Clear all site data including settings and cached files, resetting the app to its default state and reloading the page.
privacy.clear_all_data_confirm: This will reset all settings & cache, then reload the page. This action cannot be undone.
privacy.all_data_cleared: All site data cleared! Reloading page...
privacy.all_data_clear_error: Failed to clear all site data.

errors.magick: Error in Magick worker, image conversion may not work as expected.
errors.ffmpeg: Error loading FFmpeg, some features may not work as expected.
errors.pandoc: Error loading Pandoc worker, document conversion may not work as expected.
errors.file_too_large: This file exceeds the {limit}GB browser / device limit. Try Firefox or Safari to convert this large file, which typically have higher limits.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: muunna. does not collect or store personal data. We don't use cookies or trackers. Analytics are completely privacy-focused. All conversions happen locally on your browser — your files never leave your device.

conversions.title: Conversions
conversions.description: All conversions (images, documents, audio) happen entirely locally on your device using WebAssembly. Your files never leave your device.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: We use Fathom, a privacy-focused analytics tool that does not use cookies and complies with GDPR, CCPA, and PECR. Read more about [fathom_link]Fathom's privacy practices[/fathom_link].

local_storage.title: Local Storage
local_storage.description: We use your browser's local storage to save your preferences. The WebAssembly conversion tools are also cached locally so you don't need to re-download them each visit. No personal data is stored or transmitted.

toast.insecure_context: You are visiting muunna. in an insecure context (e.g. HTTP instead of HTTPS). Some features may not work as expected.
